profileAlternative.name: Jaseem Abid
profileAlternative.headline: Software Engineer at Monzo Bank
profileAlternative.summary:
My primary areas of interest are programming languages and distributed systems.

I have 4 years of experience primarily with startups in several domains - including healthcare, video delivery, enterprise automation engines, IoT and payments. I make banking awesome at Monzo right now.

aboutAlternative.text:
My primary areas of interest are programming languages and distributed systems.

I have 4 years of experience primarily with startups in several domains - including healthcare, video delivery, enterprise automation engines, IoT and payments. I make banking awesome at Monzo right now.

positions.title: Senior Software Engineer
positions.description: A career mistake that shouldn't have happened.

positions.title: Becoming a better programmer
positions.description:
The Recurse Center is a self-directed, community-driven educational retreat for programmers in New York City and I attended the Summer 1 batch from May 22nd to Aug 10th.

I worked on a lambda calculus compiler, learned x86 assembly and Rust programming language.

positions.title: Platform Engineer
positions.description: I played a key role in a 3 member team architecting and developing a distributed stream processing engine in Erlang akin Apache Kafka to power the core of the IoT platform.

positions.title: Member Technical Staff
positions.description:
Developed a mission critical automation suite used by various large financial institutions. I was part
of the team that built the run book execution engine, various backend services and user interfaces.

positions.title: Freelance developer
positions.description: Designed and built the front end and an interactive web media player. Spend a lot of time thinking about efficient ways to deliver content, codecs and all things video.

positions.title: Lead front end developer
positions.description:
Designed and built a fairly complex web application for a nascent health care startup with Ruby on
Rails and Backbone.js.

items: Libnodegit, Native git bindings for node.js with libgit2.

peopleAlsoViewed.text: Backend Engineer at Monzo. Interested in all things infrastructure and distributed systems.
Cambridge Computer Science graduate and experienced full-stack software developer
